title: Meet The Squirrel Whisperer Of Happy Valley
teaser: A squirrel at Penn State University has become a social media sensation. Emily Reddy of WPSU reports that undergraduate student Mary Krupa discovered the squirrels on campus were so tame that they'd eat from her hand, soon putting hats on them and even setting up a Facebook page, which now has more "likes" than the school's mascot.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
